keyword: how many calories in chick fil a sauce
title: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Sauce?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Chick-fil-A sauce per packet, plus full nutrition breakdown including fat, carbs, sodium, and serving tips.
h1: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Sauce?
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) packet as served by Chick-fil-A; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, location, and exact serving size. Check Chick-fil-A app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One packet of Chick-fil-A sauce contains 140 calories, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Switch to Chick-fil-A Polynesian sauce (similar serving)
Homemade light version (reduce oil by half)

faqs.q: How many calories in one packet of Chick-fil-A sauce?
What's the sodium in Chick-fil-A sauce?
faqs.a: About 1350 mg per serving, which is highâ€”use sparingly if watching salt.

faqs.q: Does Chick-fil-A sauce have protein or fiber?
faqs.a: 0 g protein and 0 g fiber per serving; it's mostly fat and sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Chick-fil-A sauce?
faqs.a: 13 g total fat, including 2 g saturated fat, per packet.

faqs.q: Can I find lower calorie alternatives to Chick-fil-A sauce?
faqs.a: Yes, try their barbecue sauce (45 kcal per packet) or make a lighter homemade version.
